pageContext.claim: “You look at what's going on San Francisco. People don't even recognize it as a city. This was one of our most beautiful places. It's with all of the needles and all of the everything else that we're not going to talk about. And by the way, it's washing into the ocean, and they have beaches, and it washes into the ocean. And our EPA is fining them, tens of billions of dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump routinely trashes cities run by Democratic politicians. In reality, San Francisco consistently rates among the most beautiful cities in America. But the president has a long-running feud with House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, whose congressional district overlaps with the city.
